text: alm taelam -ayha alrswl- 'amr 'uwlayik alyhwd aldhyn 'uetu hzzana min aleilm yusadiqun bikuli ma yuebd min dun allah min al'asnam wshyatyn al'iins waljinu tsdyqa yhmlhm ealaa althakm 'iilaa ghyr sharae allh, wayaqulun liladhin kafaruu biallah taealaa wabirasulih muhamad salaa allah ealayh wslm: hwla' alkafirun aqwmu, waedl tryqana min 'uwlayik aldhyn amnu?
